originalSteps.title: Enter the House
originalSteps.description: Open the door and enter the house.

originalSteps.title: Turn on the TV
originalSteps.description: Locate the remote control and press the power button to turn on the TV.

originalSteps.title: Turn on the Lights
originalSteps.description: Go to the light switch and turn on all the lights in the area.

originalSteps.title: Check the Refrigerator
originalSteps.description: Walk to the refrigerator and open it to check for food.

structuredSteps.text: Okay, so here's my process for entering my house.
I get the remote control and hit the power button on here.
Then I come over to my place here and I turn on all the lights.
And then, once I'm done with that, I come over here and open your driver to see if there's any food.

steps.text: Okay, so here's my process for entering my house.
I get the remote control and hit the power button on here.
Then I come over to my place here and I turn on all the lights.
And then, once I'm done with that, I come over here and open your driver to see if there's any food.

transcript: Okay, so here's my process for entering my house. Come in. I open the door.  I get the remote control and hit the power button on here.  To start up TV.  Then I come over to my place here and I turn on all the lights.  And then, once I'm done with that, I come over here and open your driver to see if there's any food.
